txt.en: 'This is grim indeed. Such great lives lost to evil that lies just beyond those mountains. That is why we march, [placeholder]. Not just for Gondor, but for Elfmar, Harding, Torferth, and all that fell to the darkness of Mordor.'
Aragorn has asked you to find Elfmar, Harding, and Torferth, all presumed to be missing in combat.
You should talk to Aragorn, who can be found at his pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.
'Éomer has informed me that Elfmar, Harding, and Torferth are missing.'
Torferth gave his life to Rohan and Gondor
Harding slew many before he fell in battle
The Aftermath: Elfmar, Harding, and Torferth
Elfmar, Harding, Torferth were last seen somewhere on the Pelennor Fields. Look for them there, after the battle.

'Éomer has informed me that Elfmar, Harding, and Torferth are all missing. While they were all seen on the battlefield, none have reported in to Éomer since we established victory. Find them quickly. I am counting on you.'
